file.name: 1.1 Info Object (answers).yaml
file.path: OSSNA-OpenAPI-Workshop-2018/OASv3/workspace1/1 - OpenAPI and Server Objects/answers/1.1 Info Object (answers).yaml
file.content:
---
# OpenAPI v3 Training Exercise

openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: TaxBlaster API
  description: |
    # Answers: Info Object
    
    This OpenAPI 2.0 specification has only minimal metadata.
    Please populate additional metadata as follows: 
    
    1. Add a `contact` object property, with `name` and `email` properties.
    2. Specify a `license` with the `name` "GNU General Public License (GPL 2.0)", 
       and URL http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
    3. Add a `termsOfService` property with the URL:
       http://franklloydwrong.com/api/terms
  
  contact:
    name: Ted Epstein
    email: ted.epstein@reprezen.com
  
  license:
    name: GNU General Public License (GPL 2.0)
    url: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
  
  termsOfService: http://franklloydwrong.com/api/terms


# The paths property is required. In this case, there are no paths defined,
# so we use empty object syntax: {}
paths: {}

externalURLs.url: https://github.com/OAI/Talks-and-Workshops/blob/ed292cacb93ad43e574d8fee6247b9d524b43b34/OSSNA-OpenAPI-Workshop-2018/OASv3/workspace1/1 - OpenAPI and Server Objects/answers/1.1 Info Object (answers).yaml
